summary_promot:
"You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or strategy guide.

"
        "Your task is to write a short, clear, and informative **English summary** of the image.
"
        "Do **not** speculate beyond what is explicitly visible in the image."
img_summary: The image displays a video game interface focused on the "Equipment" section, specifically highlighting a spirit called "Earth Wolf." This spirit is classified as "Epic" and has a high Qi cost. The ability "Wild Rapture" allows the player to take the form of the Earth Wolf and charge at enemies to make them stumble. The equipped effect grants a small amount of additional focus on hit. The player can use this ability in combat by pressing "F." The interface also shows various stats on the right side, such as health, attack, and defense, along with an option to equip the spirit by pressing "E."
